title: Noah
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921160515/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices): [Tools](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921160515/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Tools): [Type Design Tools](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921160515/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Type%20Design%20Tools) : Noah**

free old school [Type1](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921160515/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Type1) editor for Windows 3.1 and higher  
(edit [Postscript](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921160515/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Postscript) fonts like assembler code)

[http://mywebpage.netscape.com/yeahnoah/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921160515/http:/mywebpage.netscape.com/yeahnoah/index.html "http://mywebpage.netscape.com/yeahnoah/index.html")
author: andreas
